SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Can't believe the door to this
world was just some big ol' rock!
Whose big idea was it to leave
this here anyway?

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Hold on. I know this place.
A stone door means this world...

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text: Wait, you know where we are?

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Let's just head outside
and find out for sure.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.text:
In my teens, I spent a summer with some
friends of my parents in a nearby town
called Shinko.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.text:
To walk through that gate means
you are no ordinary people.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_04.text:
Funny way to say hi there, feller.
Who are you?

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.text:
Lend me your power, O mighty ones!
If you do not, I may be forced to deem
you my enemies.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text:
If you're looking to make allies here,
you are REALLY going about it badly.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_08.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_08.text:
Is everybody here like this? If so,
I'm ready to turn around and leave.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_09.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_09.text:
He's not from here—but he looks like the
kind of person who might have something
to do with the triangles.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_10.text:
Sure does—which means I reckon
we're gonna run into him again.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
It was just like that man said—
but I still have a bad feeling.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Aw, you're overthinkin' it, hon.
Triangle's a triangle, after all!

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Tarnation! That there fiend went
and transformed into a triangle!

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_020_010.text: Do you think it was from Quisstatium?

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_020_020.text:
I ain't sure, but we got a triangle,
which means our mission here in
Miyako City is finished.

SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_020_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_WRLD_BOFO_BATTLE_000_CUT_020_030.text:
Aw, c'mon! Let's sightsee
for just a little longer!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Hey there, ladies. You seen a strange fella
wandering around these parts, maybe?
He's wearing a fancy suit, but tends to
act real shady once he gets talking.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Sure have, pardner! Feller asked us if we
were gonna help him out or be his enemy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Pretty rude thing to tell somebody on their
first day in a place. So what'd you say?
You gonna lend the power or be an enemy?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Honestly, the feller seemed dead-set on
bein' a pain in the chaps from the moment
he saw us; we could tell he didn't have no
interest in bein' friends.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
If you don't mind, who are you? You came
right up to us and said hi, which probably
means you're not a local.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Cripes, tough crowd. Y'know, not everyone in
Miyako City is aloof, despite the reputation.
But yeah, my name's Tsunanori Mido, and I'm
a student over at Miyako Imperial University.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
The shady fella is trying to destroy the barrier
that protects the city, and I'm working like
heck to stop him. And I know this is all
coming out the blue, but—

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
You sure this ain't some kind of interactive
street performance, pardner? 'Cause you sound
like somebody who visits tourist traps to rope
folks into some kinda wacky hijinx.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
I suppose it might come across like that,
but everything I said is the real deal.
Sure wish where was a way I could
convince you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Well, we've got to get going.
Just tell us the rest if we see
you again, all right?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Can't quite put a finger on why,
but I reckon I believed that feller.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Me too. But it seemed like you were
taking him kind of lightly, so I decided
to match your approach.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
So we got us a shady feller and a student,
and we don't know which one of 'em has
the triangle we're lookin' for.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
That's about the long and short of it.
Without more information, it's going
to be hard to know which one to trust.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Y'know, both our grandpappies fought
with this country in the war.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MEETING_TSUNA_000_CUT_.text:
Uh... I don't think that has anything
to do with anything, actually.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
So as you can see, this is a shopping mall!
It would been really fun to browse around
if we weren't here on a job.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Shoot, look at all the people!
I ain't never seen so many.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Well, if that suspicious man is here,
it's not going to be easy to find him.
Should we split up and look?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Nuh-uh! Moment I take my eyes off you,
you'll be running into a store and maxin'
out our credit card!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
There a convention of blond fellers
in town or somethin'? We ain't never
gonna find him at this rate!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I think lots of people here just dye their hair.
But you're right—wandering around like this
isn't a very effective strategy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Wait, FORMINA? Is that you?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Naomi!? Why are you here!? Wait, did you
get into Miyako Imperial University!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I work here—but what are YOU doing here?
Are you on vacation or something?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Actually, we're here on business.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Oh, hi there! I'm Naomi Waka.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Bonnie Blair—but you can call me Bonnie.
I'm Formina's partner, and it's a right
pleasure to make your acquaintance.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Her...partner? What kind of job
are you in, Formina?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: We're police.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Wait, YOU'RE a cop!? That's crazy!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Oops! Guess I shouldn't yell that if you're trying to be all undercover, huh? Gosh, I'm just so happy to see you! I always sort of wanted to be you, you know?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Listen, darlin', we're chasin' after
a shady blond feller in a suit.
You seen anybody like that?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Oh my gosh, your accent is the BEST!
But no, I haven't seen anyone like that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Oh, but there's an off-limits area on the roof
of the mall. It's not locked, so weirdos tend
to get up there from time to time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Thanks, Naomi. You always gave me good luck,
so I know you're on the money here, too.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Naomi_Waka
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I hope we see each other again, Formina.
Good luck with everything!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Catch you up the trail, hon.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
It doesn't appear you've come to offer
your cooperation. But if it's trouble you
seek, I will not hold back.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
We ain't lookin' to cause trouble, mister.
We just wanna see what you're up to.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Well then, let me show you.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Hear me, mascot! I intend to rend asunder
the evil-spirit talisman on this shrine! For if I do not, calamity will come to
this shopping mall! You will be fired,
and your family will face great hardship!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Mascot_Mall
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: I... I will obey...

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Now tear that talisman apart, mascot!
Save those engaged in their custom at
this mall, as well as yourself and all
you hold dear!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Are them little bits'a paper really that
powerful? If they are, you ought show 'em
to us before you rip 'em to shreds.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: NOW you trouble me?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
We never said that—we simply want
to examine those talismans.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Then see them for yourselves!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
What power you have! But very well.
I will step aside for now—but know
that the real fight begins soon!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
And off he runs. Still, does that mean
them pieces of paper have the power
to protect a whole durn buildin'?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I don't believe in spooky stuff like
that—and I'm surprised that you do.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Mascot_Mall
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
H-huh...? The heck's going on?
What am I doing here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Aw, the cute little mascot's awake!
Tell us what happened here, darlin'.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Mascot_Mall
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I have no idea! Some customer just
asked me about the shrine on the roof.
I told him the area's off limits,
and then everything went fuzzy.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
There's a barrier shrine on the roof of
Sequoia Mall? Cripes, I KNEW that fella
was trying to destroy the barrier that
protects Miyako City.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Why in the world would the mall
use such an ugly mascot?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Heck, I thought that mascot
was cute as a day-old colt!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Look, forget the mascot. That shady fella
is heading for another barrier, and I need
your help if I'm gonna stop him.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Where to next, hon?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
I've heard about a spring that boosts
your luck in romance. Let's try that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
Yeee-haw! I hope some old rich
oilman asks me out on a date!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text:
That's not romantic, Bonnie.
Like, at ALL.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SEQUOIA_HOKORA_020_CUT.text: Are these two even listening to me?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
This is Sangen-in Temple. The water from the
three-pronged waterfall is famous; they say
that you'll have better luck in health,
finance, and love if you drink it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
I ain't the superstitious type, but I'm ready
to believe anything that might make me rich
and lucky in love, so let's go have a drink!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Tourist_Woman
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
To think the waterfall wouldn't be flowing
TODAY of all days! Someone really should
have put up a sign or something before
I wasted my valuable time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Emergency, Formina! The well's run dry!
I ain't never gonna find me a rich oilman
at this rate!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
The water comes from a spring at the
heart of the temple, so something
must have happened to it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
I bet it's that shady feller—and I ain't
gonna let him get away with it! C'mon!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text: I KNEW it was you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
You two again? Why are you here?
Is this a skill of those with power?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Stop talking nonsense and start givin'
the waterfall its water back!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
You are outside of my jurisdiction,
powerful ones—and I will not permit
you to get in my way!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Curse you for standing
in the way of my plans!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
I just saw that shady fella leave.
What happened to Sangen-in Temple?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
He tried to take away our romance, which made
me madder'n a wet hen—but now the spring's
back to normal and everything's peachy!
Ain't that great, Formina!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Are you two some kind of
weird comedy duo, maybe? Well, whatever—you stopped that guy's plan,
and since Sangen-in Temple is the water
barrier of the north, that means we kept
another one safe.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Well, we just got the south and west left,
which gives me a fifty-fifty chance of
tracking him down. It's appreciated, buds.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Hey, what if that college feller is
supposed to be the product of your
romantic luck, Formina?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
He seems nice enough, but he just
doesn't...do it for me, you know?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Yeah, me neither. I mean, he's cute enough,
I reckon, but there ain't nothin' there.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
I think that's because finding that man
is more important to him than we are.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_SANGENIN_SPRING_020_CU.text:
Say, that's right! He didn't even
bother askin' our names!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to Rakusuiro Tower, the symbol of
Miyako City. It's made of wood, but despite
being in an earthquake-prone country, it's
never caught fire. Isn't that incredible?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm more worried about that feller;
I reckon we're gonna see him here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm going to need you to specify
which 'feller' you mean.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_010_000.text:
Ugh! This place is covered in spiderwebs!
Is the selling point that people don't take
care of it—'cause if so, they oughta be
doin' a land-office business.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_010_010.text:
I see someone over there!
Hey, are you all right?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_000.text:
Do you reckon the spiderwebs are
also because of that feller?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_010.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_010.text:
The magatama... Scattered...
Cracked and shattered...

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_020.text:
We fought so hard and loud,
but she hasn't even noticed us.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_060.text:
That other guy set up a trap.
We got rid of the spider, but...

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_070.text: Yup. I'll see what I can do.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_080.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_080.text:
*gasp* Tsunanori? I was...
There was a man at Rakusuiro Tower...

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_100.text:
That guy's gonna pay for what
he put you through, bud.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_110.text:
This must've been another barrier!
Did we save it?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_111.speaker: Kaoruko_Hachijo
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_111.text:
The barrier is safe; the man was unable to
destroy it himself, so he tried to get me to
do it. But you arrived, and somehow...

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_112.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_112.text:
Easy there, bud. Just save your breath. Well then, all we got left is the metal
barrier in the west, and I bet anythin'
that's where the shady fella's headed.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_120.text:
I'll send Tomoko over
to check on you, eh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_140.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_140.text:
We still ain't got no clues about
where to find a dang triangle!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_141.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_141.text:
Does the last barrier also mean
this is our last chance?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_142.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_020_CUT_020_142.text:
No choice but to mosey on
over there and find out.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_120_CUT_020_140.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_120_CUT_020_140.text:
Hoo-ee! Things around here are
finally gettin' exciting!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_120_CUT_020_141.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_120_CUT_020_141.text:
This stuff seemingly has nothing to do with
the triangle, but I still want to know what
that man is hoping to accomplish.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_120_CUT_020_142.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_PAGODA_120_CUT_020_142.text:
Same here! I bet anything he's Kiss Stadium,
'cause he stinks like a week-old cow pie
just like the rest of them fellers!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_000_000.text: You bring your Game Kid, Kentaro?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_000_010.text:
You bet, guy—and there's no way
in heck I'm gonna lose this time!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_000_020.text: Lots of kids playing in this park.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_000_040.text:
They'd be in danger if somethin' happened,
so we'd better track down the shady feller
and make sure it don't!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_000.text:
Why do you harry me so?
What do you hope to gain?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_010.text:
We're just trying to find out if you
know anything about our triangles.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_020.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_020.text:
Ah, I see. Well them, this will be
a simple conversation—so long as
you are willing to work with me.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_030.text:
This world is closed off from the rest of
the Conjoined Worlds, and I have been
sent here to throw the doors wide by
destroying these bothersome barriers.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_040.text:
And how are these barriers formed, you ask?
With triangles! Indeed, the triangle you seek
is a part of the barrier—so if I destroy it,
you will earn the item you desire!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_010_050.text:
The barrier of this land is a statue called a jizo.
See for yourselves—and then take the triangle
with your own hands! Aaah ha ha ha!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_000.text:
This the jizo thing that
feller was on about?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_010.text:
There are definitely triangles
on its chest, but...

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_020.text:
Yessir, this here's definitely a trap.
That feller wants us to go one and
break the barrier ourselves.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_030.text:
But doing that might be the only way
for us to get a triangle.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_040.text:
Cripes, you two beat me to it again!
How come regular travelers like you
can find the barriers so dang easy?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_050.text:
The blond man told us the
jizo statues are a barrier.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_060.text:
And did you decide to make some
sorta deal with him, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_070.text:
Nope—but he did tell us that we'd get
a triangle we're looking for if we went
and busted up this statue.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_080.text:
Well, it's true that each knot of the barrier
often has something of equal power placed there—
so I imagine these triangle deals you're looking
for are almost certainly hidden around here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_090.text:
...But I won't let you
destroy the barrier!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_100.text:
Whoa, hang on! Look, that blond man
is nothing if not clever; I'm sure he has
some kind of backup plan in place in case
we decide not to play ball here. And that means we need to put an end
to his scheme before we even think
about triangles.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_110.text:
Yup. We got no interest in lettin'
that feller use and abuse us.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_120.text:
Well, now that the barriers are safe,
the only way to destroy it all would be...

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_130.text:
Aw, cripes! Gokakudo Temple! It's in the
center of the barriers—and if it's destroyed,
the whole dang thing comes crashing down!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_140.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_140.text:
So why didn't that shady feller
just do that to begin with?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_150.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_020_CUT_020_150.text:
Probably 'cause it's real tough—but now he
doesn't have another choice, which means
we gotta get to Gokakudo Temple!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_120_CUT_020_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_120_CUT_020_030.text:
He doesn't know we already have a triangle,
which made it SO hard to not laugh. I mean,
did you HEAR how smug he sounded there!?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_120_CUT_020_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_120_CUT_020_100.text:
Hold on. I doubt that guy's the kind to place
all his bets on us breaking this statue.
He's going to have some other kind of plan,
and we'd better figure it out and stop it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_120_CUT_020_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_120_CUT_020_110.text:
And since we got us a triangle,
he ain't got a prayer against us!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_120_CUT_020_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_JIZO_120_CUT_020_120.text: Is that so? Now that all the barriers are safe...

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.text:
This here building's older'n dirt;
it'd be real easy to bring it down.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.text:
Breaking the barrier probably isn't the
same thing as destroying the building.
There must be something else he has to do.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.text:
Which is why the college feller
said it was gonna be tough.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GOKAKUDO_020_CUT_000_0.text:
I knew you would come, powerful ones—
and for our final scene, I'm going to
use your power for my own purposes!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.text:
This barrier has recognized you as alien.
So go on—fight to your heart's content.
Either you die, or the barrier shatters.
I emerge victorious either way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.text: I'm gonna smash this to bits!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.text:
Stop, bud! That'd just destroy the barrier!
I know a way we can get the temple back
to normal, so just help me out, yeah?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_010.text:
Fight it. Damage it. Then as the
seasons pass, I'll pray at each one
and calm the temple down!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
We saved the city AND we caught the
shady fella! I can't thank you enough.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
I reckon you had the clue to the triangle
this whole time, so maybe give us a better
hint than you handed out back at the statue.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
Very well. My research tells me that the
triangle once brought to this world was split
into four, and then transformed into four
evil spirits that now roam this land. Bring down those four spirits. If you do,
the triangle will reform into a single unit.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
I attempted to use your power to break
the barrier, but I failed. I will have
to try something else next time.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
Buds, you gotta take that completed triangle
deal outta Miyako City before it causes all
kinds of havoc. You do that, and I'll take this
guy away in the meantime.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
'Bring down some spirits,' he says.
As if killing ghosts is some simple thing.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_020_CUT_020.text:
At least it's straightforward.
Now let's get goin', hon!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.text:
What the heck ARE you, anyway!?
You with them Kiss Stadium fellers?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.text:
And what purpose would knowing that serve?
You simply need to obey the triangle.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.text:
Buds, you gotta take that completed triangle
deal outta Miyako City before it causes all
kinds of havoc. You do that, and I'll take this
guy away in the meantime.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.text: Obey the triangle? Heck to that.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_CONSPIRACY_120_CUT_020.text:
Havoc, is it? I must admit the triangles
do seem to have that power to them.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text: What happened to the blond feller?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text: I banished him from Miyako City.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Okay, but if you only kicked him out,
won't he just try the same thing again?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, this is just how I do things.
I mean, heck, if I were to kill the guy,
someone else would just take his place.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Well, if that's your decision, 
I suppose it ain't our place to comment.
Guess this is farewell then, huh?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, you say that, but where do you think
you're going to go from here? This is a shrine,
buds, not Miyako Station.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
We came from the stone door, so we're going
to go home the exact same way. I mean,
that's how you banished that man, right?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
I know this door leads to the Heavens,
but I couldn't tell you what kind of place
the Heavens are.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text: Then why don't we take you there?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text: Yep—and let's keep it that way.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Two ladies inviting me on a journey?
Cripes, this has to be some kinda trap...
but I'm coming anyway!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_AMANO_IWATO_020_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, probably best not to stick my nose
where it don't belong. See ya, buds.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
Right huge building, this.
The heck is it?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Information_Staff
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
This is Miyako Theater—guess you could
call it a fortress of art, maybe.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
No way! Emily Bryant's supposed
to be singing here!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Information_Staff
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
Yes indeed! Our schedule's jam-packed with
fascinating performances, so please check
our home page and pick up tickets to
whatever strikes your fancy!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text:
I had no idea Emily toured overseas.
Seems like she became a star overnight.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_MIYAKOTHEATRE_000_CUT_.text: Who the heck is Emily Bryant?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
So this is what elementary schools
are like in the East Islands, eh?
Cute little thing, ain't it?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Welcome to Keihoku Elementary School.
Do you have business here?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Whoops! We ain't here to cause trouble,
I swear. We're just lookin' for somethin'
and happened to be passin' by.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Akane_Erisawa
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Well then, why don't we ask the children
if they've seen it? If there's anything
particular about—

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Miss Erisawa! Miss Erisawa! I...
Huh? Sorry. Didn't see that you
were talkin' to someone.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Hey there, little one! How's school?
You mindin' your Ps and Qs?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Please don't talk to me like my mom, ma'am.
Also, studying isn't fun, but I like lunch!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_EREMENTARY_SCHOOL_000_.text:
Him callin' me ma'am makes me feel ancient!
I ain't really that old, am I?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
This is a girls' school.
I doubt the triangle will be here.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Oh, those two looks like actresses.
Tomoko, you should go say hi!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
What!? Why me!? Also, they look less like
actresses and more like...suspicious.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Sophia_Beniike
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
But you're all about suspicious!
Heck, just look at your brother—
that fella's weird as all get out.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Umm... Hi there. Are you filming
a movie or something, maybe?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
You really stand out, so I was wondering
if you were acting on a set nearby.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Girl, you sure can lay it on thick!
But no, we're police.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Police officers!? Heck, this really IS
like a movie! Sorry for bothering you!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Tomoko_Mido
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Okay, don't act like you
had no part in this!

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
Ah, to be young again. Were things like
that when you were a student, Bonnie?

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
I didn't go to no fancy school with uniforms
and all that; I was an old jeans and busted-up
sneakers kind of gal all the way. But the military gave me new clothes,
as well as three hots and a cot—
which is one of the reasons I love it.

SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_EVAR_BOFO_GIRLS_SCHOOLLIFE_000_C.text:
I bet you'd be super cute
in a school uniform.

SUB_W01_LTXT_BOFO_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_LTXT_BOFO_RAKUHOKUSTA_000_CUT_00.text:
Rakuto Station is close to Sequoia Mall,
and Rakunan Station is close to Keihoku
Elementary School. Where should we go?

SUB_W01_LTXT_BOFO_RAKUTOSTA_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_LTXT_BOFO_RAKUTOSTA_000_CUT_000_.text:
Rakuhoku Station is close to Miyako Imperial
University, and Rakunan Station is close to
Keihoku Elementary School. Where should we go?

SUB_W01_LTXT_BOFO_RAKUNANSTA_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W01_LTXT_BOFO_RAKUNANSTA_000_CUT_000.text:
Rakuhoku Station is close to Miyako Imperial
University, and Rakuto Station is close to
Sequoia Mall. Where should we go?
